Decay.Name: Decay
Decay.Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

Doubt.Name: Doubt
Doubt.Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak.

Normality.Name: Normality
Normality.Description: Unplayable. While in hand, you cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.

Pain.Name: Pain
Pain.Description: Unplayable. While in hand, lose 1 HP whenever you play another card.

Parasite.Name: Parasite
Parasite.Description: Unplayable. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

Regret.Name: Regret
Regret.Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Shame.Name: Shame
Shame.Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.

Ascender's Bane.Name: Ascender's Bane
Ascender's Bane.Description: Unplayable. Ethereal. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Curse of the Bell.Name: Curse of the Bell
Curse of the Bell.Description: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Necronomicurse.Name: Necronomicurse
Necronomicurse.Description: Unplayable. There is no escape from this Curse.

Pride.Name: Pride
Pride.Description: Innate. At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
